title: Business Marriage
overview: Sayama Miyabi is a career-minded girl who got dumped by her boyfriend on their sixth anniversary. Just when she decides to live her life focusing on work, she meets Tsukasa, a CEO who wants to marry without romantic feelings for a reason. Tsukasa sees Miyabi's work-first attitude and proposes a business marriage, with the condition that they must divorce as soon as they develop romantic feelings for each other.
